name: Bitverse
description:
Bitverse

READ THE CONTROLS!!!

The controls to teleport to the levels are complicated, so make sure to read them if you can't figure it out.

This game was made by me with the help of the_doctor090 and Sean for Ludum Dare 38. This was our first ever Ludum Dare, so the game is kinda "questionable" :p

Explore isometric planets and kill its inhabitants in order to fuel your ship. Collect 7 resources from 7 different levels to win the game.

Fullscreen is recommended.

READ THE CONTROLS!!!

Controls:
  • WASD: Movement
  • Double tap C: Drop Weapon
  • E: Teleport while on a red X, Interact with console on ship, Take crystal
  • Left Mouse Button: Shoot
  • To teleport to a level, select a planet from the ship console, then press E while standing on the red X.
  • Make sure to pick up the crystals at the end of each level. They unlock the next one. To pick them up, right click on them while standing near them.
  • To close the console, simply walk away from it.
